name: Modern Languages (French and Spanish)
feeDetails: Eligible UK and EU students can apply for a tuition fee loan to cover the cost of tuition fees from the government which you repay gradually through small monthly repayments.
aboutCourse:
School Direct (Tuition Fee) is a school-led route into teaching at secondary stage. On this route you will join other student teachers on one of the PGCE programmes at Goldsmiths while undertaking your teaching experience in a participating school. The UCAS application will go to the relevant school.

The Languages (French and Spainish) PGCE explores languages teaching and learning by combining theory and practice in innovative, inspiring and effective ways. This helps students develop a critical awareness and strong classroom skills to enable them to become a principled professional and educational thinker.
interviewProcess:
Candidates whose application form shows that they meet our short-listing criteria will be invited to an Interview Day. 

The selection process will usually involve: 

*A classroom-based task 
*Time with staff/departments 
*A formal interview 
*A written task 

We recommend that you aim to gain some experience in a classroom prior to interview.
howSchoolPlacementsWork:
You will spend the majority of time in your main placement school but will also be required to carry out a 2nd placement at another school which is usually for a period of 6-12 weeks.  

Your 2nd placement will provide you with an excellent opportunity to compare and contrast different approaches to all aspects of teaching.
personalQualities: We are looking for inspiring, knowledgeable and ambitious trainee teachers who are passionate and enthusiastic about their school phase and/or subject specialism and have a desire to share this and make a real difference to young people's lives and futures.
